background.summary: I am a GenAI and full-stack AI/ML engineer focused on building production-grade intelligent systems. My work combines large language models, retrieval-augmented generation, agentic workflows, and cloud-native deployment, with a strong emphasis on safety, reliability, and human control.

dissertation.title: Mental-health prediction platform using machine learning models
dissertation.description: Designed and implemented a full-stack mental-health prediction system integrating machine learning with human-centred interface design. Studied how users interpret, trust, and act on AI predictions in high-sensitivity contexts.
dissertation.research_contribution: Foundation for research direction in Human-AI Interaction, demonstrating how interaction design shapes trust and safety in high-stakes AI systems

Redesigned explanation formats and interaction flows
